SEARCH
Module jakarta.messaging
Package jakarta.jms

Interface XATopicConnection

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Connection, TopicConnection, XAConnection
public interface XATopicConnection extends XAConnection, TopicConnection
An XATopicConnection provides the same create options as TopicConnection (optional). The Topic connections created are transactional.

The XATopicConnection interface is optional. Jakarta Messaging providers are not required to support this interface. This interface is for use by Jakarta Messaging providers to support transactional environments. Client programs are strongly encouraged to use the transactional support available in their environment, rather than use these XA interfaces directly.

Since:
JMS 1.0
Version:
Jakarta Messaging 2.0
